name: @acegoal07/file-tools
description: A package of easy to use tools for interacting with files using javascript

scripts.build: npx -p typescript tsc src/index.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir types && npm run tscBuild
scripts.copy: xcopy /s/y src dist && xcopy /y package.json dist && xcopy /y readme.md dist && xcopy /y lICENSE dist

author: acegoal07
